Containers.Name: ncdu - NCurses Disk Usage for UNRAID
Containers.Description: On the road and wondering what's eating up your precious disk space? Access to a SSH terminal but nothing else, no time to sift through folders? ncdu is a command-line disk usage analyzer with an ncurses interface.
Containers.Changes: ###2023.09.13 - release note: welcome to the first version of the ncdu package. - release note: please report any problems in the support topic.
